properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued January 7 at 3:17AM EST until January 8 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Minor lakeshore flooding expected.

* WHERE...Huron County, mainly between Sand Point and Port Austin,
which includes Caseville.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 4 PM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property along the
lakeshore.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northwest winds will increase to 20 to 30
MPH tonight and will persist into Wednesday afternoon. These
gusty winds and the wave action will contribute to high water
levels along the shore.
properties.instruction:
Residents on or near the shore should take appropriate action to
protect property from rising water levels.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 4 PM EST WEDNESDAY
